agents.name: context-menu-coordinator

- Tabs (Close, Close Others, Pin, etc.)

2. Add .contextMenu to file tree
3. Add .contextMenu to tabs
4. Add .contextMenu to terminal
5. Add .contextMenu to git panel
6. Wire all actions

FILES:

- Views/FileTreeView.swift
- Views/TabBarView.swift

USE SwiftUI .contextMenu modifier!
